# trim-words changelog

## 2.0.0 - Apr 30, 2021

### Enhancement

- Migrated from `JS` to `TS`
- Strip `style` and `script` content with tags

## 1.2.1 - Nov 01, 2019

### Fix

- Removed test and other unused files from npm.

## 1.1.0 - Oct 26, 2019

### Fix

- Removing stripTags, trim functions and adding trim-php as a dependency.

## 1.0.0 - Oct 25, 2019

- Initial Release
